svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/26.2.15 Chrome/134.0.6998.205 Electron/35.2.1 Safari/537.36" version="26.2.15"> <diagram name="第 1 页" id="aGAc6AfAoe5toP1QypaG"> <mxGraphModel dx="1028" dy="694" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-1" value="" style="ellipse;fillColor=strokeColor;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="492.5" y="80" width="15" height="15" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-2" value="在物品栏中" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=default;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=12;fontColor=default;fillColor=default;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="450" y="150" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-6" value="判定使用条件" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=default;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=12;fontColor=default;fillColor=default;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="450" y="330" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-7" value="可食用" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="354" y="450" width="60" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-8" value="可装备" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="470" y="450" width="60" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-9" value="可投掷" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="590" y="450" width="60" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-10" value="条件不满足" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="450" y="240" width="50" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-11" value="食物能力生效" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="180" y="545" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-12" value="装备生效" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="460" y="545" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-13" value="范围生效" style="rounded=1;arcSize=20;strokeWidth=2" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="580" y="545" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-14" value="" style="ellipse;shape=endState;fillColor=strokeColor;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="670" y="150" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-15" value="" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;rounded=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-1" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-31" value="玩家获取" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-15"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="30" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-16" value="物品耗尽" style="startArrow=none;;rounded=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=1;exitY=0.25;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-2" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-14"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="680" y="200" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="710" y="160" as="targetPoint" /> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-17" value="" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=0.75;exitY=1;entryX=0.75;entryY=0;rounded=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-2" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="659" y="235" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-32" value="使用" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-17"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="19" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-18" value="物品类型=食物" style="startArrow=none;;entryX=0.49;entryY=-0.01;rounded=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-6" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-7"> <mxGeometry x="0.5198" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-19" value="物品类型=装备" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=-0.01;rounded=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-6" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-8"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-20" value="物品类型=药水" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;entryX=0.5;entryY=-0.01;rounded=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-6" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-9"> <mxGeometry x="0.5294" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-21" value="其他情况" style="startArrow=none;;rounded=0;exitX=0.25;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-6" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-10"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="470.91" y="390" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="470.41" y="300" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-22" value="食用" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;entryX=0.75;entryY=-0.01;rounded=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-7" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-11"> <mxGeometry x="-0.5354" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-23" value="占用装备槽" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=0.5;exitY=0.99;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;rounded=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-8" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-12"> <mxGeometry x="0.0667" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-24" value="投掷后影响指定范围" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=0.5;exitY=0.99;entryX=0.5;entryY=-0.01;rounded=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-9" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-13"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-25" value="取消使用" style="startArrow=none;;entryX=0.25;entryY=1;rounded=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-10" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-26" value="消耗一个物品" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=0.28;exitY=-0.01;entryX=0;entryY=0.25;rounded=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-11" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-2"> <mxGeometry x="-0.4465" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-27" value="脱下装备
（不消耗物品）" style="startArrow=none;;entryX=0;entryY=0.75;rounded=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-12" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-2"> <mxGeometry x="0.0204" relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="280" y="565" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="180" /> </Array> <mxPoint x="420" y="565" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-28" value="药水消耗" style="startArrow=none;;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;rounded=0;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.75;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-13" target="QZJHihQBNB5GQxOF3OZ4-2"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0389" y="-2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="680" y="565" /> <mxPoint x="680" y="180" /> </Array> <mxPoint x="670" y="210" as="targetPoint" /> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 48px; height: 1px; padding-top: 180px; margin-left: 284px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 44px; margin-left: 364px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
